title: Chloé font
content:
Does anyone know the typeface used for Chloé identity? Nice looking serif.  
Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150217130245im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Chloe_6053.png)
author: apparatus™

comments.content:
oops sorry, I did do a search but it didn'y pick up anything? Is that a browser problem,  
I use the latest firefox on a mac.

It’s a custom design. WTF suggests [URW Garamond Demi (Narrow)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150217130245/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/garamond/urw-garamond-t-demi-narrow/) as being similar.

If you know want you’re looking for, you can run a search via Google or other engines and narrow it down to Typophile by adding <cite>site:typophile.com</cite> to your query.
Yes, the built-in Typophile search is kinda crap, alas. No, not a browser-specific problem.
